content:
Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 妃
<|1|> Kisaki

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 妃
<|2|> [海は、嫌いです。朝風がべたついてたまリません

<|1|> Kisaki
<|2|> I hate the sea. The morning breeze is always so sticky.

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 島へ降り立った俺を一番に迎えたのは、家族だった
<|1|> The first to greet me when I stepped onto the island was my family.

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 彼女の名前は、月社妃という.
<|1|> Her name is Tsukiyashiro Kisaki.

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 彼女の名前は、月社妃という。 別居した両親のうちの、母親の方に残された、実の妹.
<|1|> Her name is Tsukiyashiro Kisaki. My real younger sister, left with our mother after my parents separated.

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 瑠璃
<|2|> [それだけ髪が長いと大変だろうなあ

<|1|> Ruri
<|2|> You must have a lot of trouble with hair that long.

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 目をそらして、どうでも良さそうに返す.
<|1|> I looked away, replying as if I didn’t care.

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 目をそらして、どうでも良さそうに返す. 数ヶ月振リの再会でも、俺たちの距離感は何一つ変わっていなかつ た.
<|1|> I looked away, replying as if I didn’t care. Even after a reunion of several months, the distance between us hadn’t changed one bit.

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 妃は、水平線の彼方を見つめている。
<|1|> Kisaki was gazing at the horizon.

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 紀は、水平線の彼方を見つめている. 風に摩く髪の毛を片手で抑えながら、無表情に。
<|1|> Kisaki was gazing at the horizon. With one hand holding back her wind-tousled hair, her expression remained blank.

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 妃
<|2|> 「それでは、いっその二と肩の辺リまで切リ落としてしまいましようか

<|1|> Kisaki
<|2|> “How about I just cut everything off, right around your shoulders?”

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 意地悪そうに、笑ってみせた
<|1|> I forced a spiteful smile.

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 瑠璃
<|2|> お前は長い方が似合うんだから、 そのまま口した方がいい

<|1|> Ruri
<|2|> You suit long hair better, you should just say what’s on your mind.

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 妃
<|2|> [そんなことは、分かっていますよ。瑠璃は私の髪にメロメロですか らね」

<|1|> Kisaki
<|2|> “I know that, you know. Ruri is head over heels for my hair.”

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 優雅に髪をかきあげる
<|1|> She gracefully swept her hair back.

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 憂雅に髪をかきあげる 挑発的な視線が、まるで誘っているように見えた。
<|1|> She gracefully swept her hair back. Her provocative gaze seemed like an invitation.

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 挑→
<|2|> 憂雅に髪をかきあける

<|1|> Challenge →
<|2|> She gracefully sweeps her hair back.

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 瑠璃
<|2|> [何いってんだか

<|1|> Ruri
<|2|> What are you even saying?

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 保れながら、海岸沿いの遊歩道へ歩を進める
<|1|> While maintaining our pace, we started walking along the coastal promenade.

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 保れながら、海岸沿いの遊歩道へ歩を進める 妃の言葉をいちいちまに受けていたら、きりがない。
<|1|> While maintaining our pace, we started walking along the coastal promenade. If I took everything Kisaki said to heart, it would never end.

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 妃
<|2|> [本土の生活は、いかがでしたか？ 私のいない場所では、さぞの んびり出来たことでしょうね

<|1|> Kisaki
<|2|> “How was life on the mainland? You must have been able to relax quite a bit without me around.”

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 肩を並べながら、 久方ぶりの雑談二興じる
<|1|> Walking side-by-side, we engaged in casual conversation for the first time in a long while.

Translate these segments to English, maintaining the exact <|n|> tags:

<|1|> 瑠璃
<|2|> 「ああ、平和で素敵な毎日だったよ]

<|1|> Ruri
<|2|> “Ah, it was a peaceful and wonderful everyday life.”
